name: Pixelorama Project
summary: A PXO file is a project created by Orama Interactive Pixelorama, an open-source sprite editor. It contains project information, such as pencil strokes, lines, shapes, gradients, and shading that comprise the graphic, along with metadata, such as the canvas size and creator. Users typically open and edit PXO files with Pixelorama and export them as .PNG images.
